column4: Hello everyone. I have a problem. I am trying to use apt-get to install the restricted moduels, but it asks for a CD, well i dont have the CD anymore, what do I do to make it get it from the internet?
go to /etc/apt/sources.list and comment out the deb cdrom entry
np, let me know if that works :0
Worked great. Thanks alot, i appriciate it.
